item.name: getTaxonomyByLevel | Get Taxonomy Information by Level

request.name: getTaxonomyByLevel | Get Taxonomy Information by Level

description.content: Get Taxonomy Details for a given level

query.description: Level 0 (Department) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.
Level 1 (L1 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.
Level 2 (L2 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.
Level 3 (L3 Category) slug of the taxonomy to filter results.
Applied limit on the number of items to be returned. Default is 5000.

variable.description: (Required) The level of taxonomy hierarchy to fetch: 0: Fetch departments. 1: Fetch L1 categories. 2: Fetch L2 categories. 3: Fetch L3 categories.
(Required) The level of taxonomy hierarchy to fetch: 0: Fetch departments. 1: Fetch L1 categories. 2: Fetch L2 categories. 3: Fetch L3 categories.

response.name: Bad request. See the error object in the response body for specific reason
